title: "Sam’s Club is testing out AI, computer vision tech to speed up exit process at stores"
excerpt: "Pilots are currently underway at 10 Sam’s Club locations and involves a combination of computer vision and digital technology which captures images of carts and verifies payment for all the items in the shopper’s possession."
